title: Is Crocodile / Alligator meat halal & Using it's Leather - Assim al hakeem
transcript: the scholars like to be um [Music] and so on they say that the meat of crocodiles and alligators is haram due to that fact some scholars say that it is halal because it's not mentioned and it cannot live without water it will die if it stays out of water for a long time and personally i am among those who are hesitant to give a clear direction yes eating the meat of it is not permissible due to the ambiguity regarding it but it seems that using its leather after tanning it is halal and allah azza knows best
